name: Peakode
description:
Peakode develops intuitive mobile applications for local and global startups as well as enterprises. We are an ambitious mobile development studio with a team of inspired engineers, developers and designers.
Our experienced and professional engineers and designers work for best user experiences with high-performed usability. 
Our services include; App UX & UI Design, Webservice/Backend Development, CMS Development, iOS Development, Android Development, Business Development. We also work on projects that utilize machine learning and augmented/virtual reality.
We work on tailor-made apps which diversifies on business domains and therefore allows us becoming professional on different project domains and expertises.
Documentation is the basis of Peakode's project lifecycle. We document before design & development and take every step seriously to harness the perfect app tailored to your needs.
Peakode's project lifecycle follows these steps;
Initiation > Proposal & Contract > Concept & Strategy > UI & UX Design > Development, Testing & Deployment > Support & Maintenance
